name: Yann-An-Oed
movement: 30 feet on land and 40 feet while swimming
description: The Yann-An-Oed is a huge aberration, known for its adaptability both underwater and on land, featuring a blowhole for hooting calls.
memorable: Its unique ability to swallow prey while dealing ongoing acid damage makes encountering it particularly dangerous.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey in its aquatic environment.
relations: Can be found in the company of other aquatic predators.
environment: Typically found in aquatic environments, both in water and on land.
strengths: Excellent stealth underwater and the ability to grapple and swallow foes.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, leading to ineffective social interactions.
attacks: Bite attack dealing piercing damage and tentacle attack that can grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Swallow ability, allowing it to consume prey and inflict ongoing acid damage while immobilized.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, making it effective in dark or murky waters.
skills: Has proficiency in perception enabling it to sense threats effectively.
additional_information: Amphibious, can breathe both air and water.
Underwater camouflage grants advantage on stealth checks in water.
The Hoot ability can track creatures that respond to its call.
test_queries: huge aquatic predator with hooting call
ambush creature that can swallow prey
stealthy monster found in water and land
creature that grapples and deals acid damage
